title: News24.com | Lockdown Day 4: Concern over conduct of law enforcement after 3 deaths
description: The conduct of police and the SANDF in the first four days of the national lockdown has come into sharp focus with three deaths, allegedly at the hands of law enforcement officers, and claims of abuse, heavy-handed policing and the use of excessive force.
